bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of some small foreign objects having entered the eyes and remaining there, causing pain and making opening one’s eyes difficult. Xin xiu ben cao 新修本草 Substance Entry chuan bao yu sheng 穿鮑魚繩：亦主眯目、去刺，煮汁洗之大良也 , “It also controls dust in the eyes , and removes stings. Boil [in water] and use the liquid to rinse the [afflicted region]. Very good”. Mi se 秘塞 , closure [14]

IS, Pathological Condition identical with da bian mi 大便秘 , constipation. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 1:又療傷寒 或始得至七八日不大便，或四五日後不大便，或下後秘塞者，承氣湯方 , “Also, to cure cases where there has been no defecation for seven or eight days following the onset of harm caused by cold, or where there has been no defecation for four to five days after [the onset of the disease], or where following a [therapy of] discharge there is closure , the recipe for the ‘decoction to uphold the qi’ [is appropriate]”.
